thread.title: I Dare you to Love my Rough Edges. {Poem}
thread.title_full: I Dare you to Love my Rough Edges. {Poem}

author: elephant journal
title: I Dare you to Love my Rough Edges. {Poem}
text:
I dare you to love me. 
I dare you to run your hands over my prickly legs, my full hips, my dimpled skin. 
I dare you to smell my bodily odors, taste my salty skin, feel my rough edges. 
I dare you to embrace me; when I tremble, when I shake, when I cry out. 
I dare you to hear me. Listen to my fears, my doubts my insecurities. 
I dare you watch me when I try, when I fail, when I get up again. 
I dare you to have patience when I make the same mistakeâ€”over, and over and over. 
I dare you to remind me I am beautiful, I am worthy, I am loved. 
I dare you to look in the mirror, and remember, this reflection is your best friend. 
I dare you to love me. 
~
